maps.name: Aircraft Carrier
maps.description: A tropical shipyard map centered around a grounded aircraft carrier, featuring dynamic elements like a moving barge and multiple flanking routes through naval warehouses.

maps.name: Blossom Crash
maps.description: Set in a spring-themed environment disrupted by a recent crash, this map combines natural beauty with chaotic terrain, offering varied combat scenarios.

maps.name: Nexus Dam
maps.description: An industrial map featuring a massive dam structure, providing vertical gameplay opportunities and strategic choke-points.

maps.name: Nord Oko
maps.description: A snow-covered map with a circular design, offering multiple paths and central control points, designed for strategic maneuvering.

maps.name: Project Phoenix
maps.description: A scientific research base set in the foothills of a mountain range offering a chaotic thunder-dome with several flanking routes.

maps.name: Scarred City
maps.description: An urban map set in a war-torn cityscape, supporting multiple game modes like Conquest, Domination, and Plant and Defuse, with a dynamic kite formation base layout.

maps.name: Sunstroke
maps.description: A desert resort map with a focus on close quarter combat and flanking through city streets and construction sites.
